banner.title: The Launchpad for Building the Future Generation
banner.description: Safwat Al Safwa Schools are the true starting point for shaping students’ character — morally, academically, and professionally. We empower them to understand their community and reality with confidence and face future challenges with awareness and excellence. With extensive experience in teaching and curriculum development, we provide meaningful education that instills values and shapes the vision of a bright tomorrow.

about.title: Empowering Students to Shape a Confident Future
about.description: We believe that school is the true starting point for building a student's character—ethically, academically, and professionally—enabling them to understand their social environment and confidently face future challenges. With extensive experience in education and deep research in educational management and curriculum development, we established Safwat Al-Safwa International Schools as an educational beacon that combines academic and vocational learning with a strong focus on quality and innovation. We go beyond teaching beneficial knowledge; we develop strong personalities and shape a bright future built on solid values, ambitious vision, and realistic goals. We prepare students for success and positive contribution to their community—starting from the foundational elementary stage, progressing through the middle stage with broader applied sciences, and finally the high school stage where they are equipped with the keys to their future.
about.mission_text: Providing integrated education that instills values, strengthens self-confidence, and develops students’ thinking and creative skills. We aim to create an inspiring learning environment that encourages continuous learning and fosters positive interaction among students, teachers, and the community.
about.vision_text: To become a leading and inspiring model in private education in the Kingdom, combining academic excellence, personal development, and future-ready skills. We adopt the latest educational and technological methods to ensure modern and impactful learning.
about.values_text: Excellence – Creativity – Responsibility – Cooperation – Integrity – Love of Learning – Respect for Others – Innovation – Teamwork – Community Service

benefits.title: at Safwat Al-Safwa International Schools
benefits.description: We provide a holistic education that develops students’ character, strengthens their academic and social skills, instills strong values and ethics, and inspires creativity, excellence, and teamwork—preparing them for a successful future.
benefits.useful_education_text: Providing practical and meaningful education that enables students to succeed academically and professionally, preparing them to face future challenges.
benefits.self_development_text: Enhancing self-confidence, fostering critical and creative thinking, and teaching effective communication and teamwork skills.
benefits.international_certificate_text: Obtaining internationally recognized certificates that open wide opportunities for work and study locally and globally.
benefits.job_opportunities_text: Facilitating access to distinguished job opportunities in both the public and private sectors, locally and internationally.
benefits.community_contribution_text: Cultivating a sense of social responsibility through student and graduate participation in community projects and initiatives.
benefits.continuous_education_text: Providing continuous education programs for students and community members to keep pace with scientific and knowledge developments.

contact.contact_us_description: We are here to help you with any inquiry or request
contact.subject: Subject

scholarships.title: Scholarships
scholarships.description: We offer scholarships for academically outstanding students and talented learners across different grade levels to support their success and growth.

degrees.title: Certificates Awarded by the Schools
degrees.description: Safwat Al-Safwa International Schools award the following certificates:
degrees.diploma_subtitle: Certificate of Advancement to the Next Grade
degrees.diploma_description: A certificate confirming that the student has progressed to the next grade
degrees.elementary_description: A certificate that qualifies the student to enter the intermediate stage
degrees.intermediate_description: A certificate that qualifies the student to enter the secondary stage
degrees.secondary_description: A certificate that qualifies the student to join university or the job market
degrees.excellence_description: Awarded to students with distinguished academic achievement
degrees.achievement_description: Awarded to students who excel in various activities and talents

example_card.welcome_text: Welcome to Safwat Al-Safwa International Schools, where we strive to provide distinguished education that meets the needs of students in the 21st century.

featured_programs.title: Featured Educational Programs
featured_programs.description: Safwa Schools offer a range of distinguished educational programs that combine quality, knowledge, and practical skills to prepare future leaders.
featured_programs.computer_science_desc: A program focused on sciences and mathematics to develop logical thinking and scientific analysis skills among students.
featured_programs.business_management_desc: A program that develops Arabic and English language skills to enable students to communicate effectively and express themselves.
featured_programs.medical_sciences_desc: An integrated program in social sciences that helps students understand society and interact with it positively.
featured_programs.environmental_studies_desc: A program focused on Islamic education and instilling values and moral principles in students.
featured_programs.mechanical_engineering_desc: A program that develops sports and physical skills and enhances team spirit and fair competition.
featured_programs.data_analysis_desc: A program focused on artistic and creative activities to develop talents and creativity among students.

history.title: Vision, Mission & Goals
history.description: Safwat Al Safwa Schools are committed to providing high-quality education to graduate distinguished students who compete with students from the finest schools. We focus on interactive, self-directed, and collaborative learning, scientific research, and training to establish knowledge. We provide continuous education for students and interested community members to keep pace with rapid changes for self-development and efficiency enhancement.
history.founding_2015: Establishment of Safwat Al Safwa Schools as one of the leading schools in Saudi Arabia
history.opening_2018: Opening the first academic stages and starting educational programs in various stages
history.graduate_2020: Launching advanced educational programs and development activities in various stages
history.expansion_2023: Schools expansion and opening new branches and advanced educational programs
history.mission_text: To cultivate and develop good character and self-confidence, and provide high-quality education with practical application to equip students with scientific and practical tools before graduation to produce distinguished students. To promote creativity in finding innovative solutions to current and expected challenges, provide distinguished research that contributes to sustainable development, protect human rights, and enhance knowledge exchange with specialized schools and institutions.
history.vision_text: To provide high-quality education, continuous updating of curricula to match scientific progress, provide continuous education opportunities for students and interested community members to keep pace with rapid scientific development and rehabilitation to meet current and future labor market needs, provide an inspiring and innovative educational environment, focus on interactive, self-directed, and collaborative learning methods and scientific research to establish knowledge, enhance distance learning to obtain scientific material at the appropriate time and reduce study costs, horizontal and vertical integration of curricula, study by semester system to accommodate different capabilities and abilities of each student, conduct research and practical studies to solve current and expected challenges, graduate highly qualified students with insightful vision in various school specializations to be future leaders, respect others' ideas and beliefs, evaluate practical experiences, contribute to community service, prepare future leaders, support sustainable development, and cooperate with specialized schools and institutions internationally.
history.goals_text: To qualify students to become specialists in their field, support scientific research and innovation in various fields, enhance knowledge and understanding in various scientific fields, and contribute to community development.
history.academic_excellence_text: Striving to achieve excellence in education and promote scientific research
history.community_participation_text: Effective contribution to community development and preparing future leaders
history.innovation_text: Promoting creative thinking to find practical solutions to challenges
history.global_vision_text: Cooperation with specialized schools and institutions internationally

institutes.title: Educational Stages
institutes.description: We begin from the age of four and the stage is divided into two phases: the Foundation Phase and the Upper Elementary Phase.
institutes.elementary_description: The elementary stage starts from the age of four and is divided into two phases. The Foundation Phase includes six academic levels based on guided learning with the aim of teaching: good morals and human behavior, reading and writing, arithmetic, Tajweed, and basic computer skills. The Upper Elementary Phase includes six academic levels based on interactive, self, and cooperative learning, and scientific research with the aim of teaching the fundamentals of: Arabic language, science, mathematics, religious studies, computer studies, geography, history, and English (optional subject).
institutes.middle_description: The middle school stage consists of six academic levels and adopts interactive, self, and cooperative learning as well as scientific research. Its goal is to expand students’ knowledge in the various sciences they studied in elementary school in addition to introducing applied sciences.
institutes.high_description: The high school stage consists of six academic levels and concludes when the student reaches the age of fifteen. It adopts interactive, self, and cooperative learning as well as scientific research. It focuses on preparing students for a college education that suits their abilities or teaching a profession to qualify them to join the job market if they do not wish to pursue university studies.
elementary_goals: Develop reading, writing, speaking, and listening skills
Instill core moral values and ethics
middle_goals: Connect academic knowledge with practical skills
Prepare students for high school and university
high_goals: Prepare students for university and the job market
Develop leadership and effective communication skills

mission_goals.title: Mission & Goals
mission_goals.description: We are committed to a clear mission and specific goals to achieve excellence in education and scientific research
mission_items: Provide high-quality education and practical application to equip students with scientific and practical tools
Promote creativity to find innovative solutions to current and expected challenges
Provide distinguished research that contributes to sustainable development
Promote knowledge exchange with specialized schools and institutions
goals_items: Qualify students to become specialists in their fields
Support scientific research and innovation in various fields
Promote knowledge and understanding in various scientific fields
Cooperate with specialized schools and institutions

principles.title: Principles & Values
principles.description: We are committed to a set of principles and values that govern our work and guide our vision towards excellence
principles_items: Promote mutual respect between faculty, students, and staff
values_items: Strive to achieve excellence in education
Promote transparency and accountability in all transactions
Support publication of peer-reviewed scientific research
Promote creative thinking to find practical solutions to present and future challenges

recent_news.title: Recent News
recent_news.description: Follow the latest news, events, and activities at Safwa Schools
recent_news.anniversary_description: Safwat Al-Safwa Schools celebrated their 10th anniversary with the presence of senior officials and academics. The celebration witnessed the honoring of outstanding students and distinguished faculty members, in addition to announcing new development projects aimed at enhancing educational and research quality.
recent_news.scholarship_description: The schools announced the launch of a comprehensive scholarship program targeting outstanding students from various academic levels. The program covers full tuition fees in addition to a monthly stipend and free study materials for eligible students.
recent_news.lab_description: A group of advanced scientific laboratories was opened in various stages, equipped with the latest technologies and scientific equipment to provide an excellent educational and research environment for students and faculty members.

remote_learning.title: Remote Learning
remote_learning.description: Enables students from different geographical areas to learn through modern educational means; providing flexible educational opportunities for everyone at a pace that suits their individual needs
remote_learning.synchronous_description: Interactive live lectures through virtual classrooms via the internet
remote_learning.asynchronous_description: Pre-recorded lectures that allow students to access them at the appropriate time for each student and participate in discussions
remote_learning.benefits_description: Remote learning encourages self-directed and collaborative learning without the need to be present in traditional classrooms
synchronous_features_list: No need to travel to school
Saves time and reduces study costs
Direct interaction with teacher and colleagues
Ability to ask questions and get immediate answers
asynchronous_features_list: Student studies at their convenient time
Review lectures as needed to enhance understanding
Ability to pause and replay as needed
Saves time and effort in commuting
general_benefits_list: Reduces costs associated with traditional education such as travel and accommodation
Provides flexible educational opportunities for everyone
Enables access to education from anywhere in the world
Provides a comfortable and suitable learning environment

research_center.title: Research and Studies Center
research_center.description: The center has created the first beacon for a better tomorrow for what the individual and society should be to contribute to achieving security, peace, and sustainable development in 246 volumes
research_center.scientific_research_description: The center conducts more research and studies to achieve the schools' goals in various scientific and academic fields
research_center.specialized_studies_description: We provide specialized studies in various fields to achieve security, peace, and sustainable development in society
research_center.scientific_publication_description: Publishing research and studies in 246 volumes to be a beacon of science and knowledge in various fields
research_goals_list: Produce distinguished scientific research that contributes to sustainable development
Support researchers and academics in various specializations
Enhance research cooperation with local and international institutions
studies_goals_list: Conduct in-depth studies on societal issues
publication_goals_list: Make research available to researchers and interested parties
Contribute to building a knowledge society

stats.title: Schools Statistics
stats.description: The schools provide a leading educational experience that combines quality, knowledge, and scientific research, with an academic environment that stimulates creativity and innovation to serve society locally and internationally.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: We strive to achieve a comprehensive vision that places Safwat Al-Safwa Schools at the forefront
vision.basic_vision_text: Providing high-quality education with continuous updating of curricula to match scientific progress
vision.continuous_education_text: Providing continuous education opportunities for students and interested community members to keep pace with rapid scientific development
vision.educational_environment_text: Providing an inspiring and innovative educational environment with a focus on interactive, self-directed, and collaborative learning
vision.distance_learning_text: Enhancing distance learning to obtain scientific material at the appropriate time and reduce study costs
vision.academic_integration_text: Horizontal and vertical integration of curricula with semester-based study system
vision.scientific_research_text: Conducting practical research and studies to solve current and expected challenges
vision.leadership_preparation_text: Graduating highly qualified students with insightful vision in various school specializations
vision.international_cooperation_text: Cooperation with specialized schools and institutions with establishing strong international partnerships

admissions.main_description: Safwat Al Safwa Schools are committed to providing high-quality education to graduate distinguished students who compete with students from the finest schools. We focus on interactive, self-directed, and collaborative learning, scientific research, and training to establish knowledge.

step1.title: Submit Application
step1.description: Fill out the online application form and submit all required documents through the schools website

step2.title: Submit Documents
step2.description: Send all required documents such as academic certificates, ID photos, and personal photos

step3.title: Personal Interview
step3.description: You will be invited for a personal interview with the admissions committee to evaluate your abilities and academic qualifications

step4.title: Receive Decision
step4.description: You will receive notification of the admission or rejection decision via email or text messages

academic_records.title: Academic Records

recommendation_letters.title: Recommendation Letters
